arm_group.description: Patients in this group will not receive Pomegranate pills.
The reccruited patient will receive pomegranate pills every day for 12 weeks. The control group will not be exposed for the pills.

brief_summary.textblock:
Some animal studies revealed that the pomegranate juice may improve sperm quality in terms
      of concentration, motility and morphology, as well as in fertilization rate.

      Minor data is available regarding the influence on male sperm.

clinical_study.brief_title: Anti-oxidative Influence From Pomegranate Tablets on Male Sperm Quality in Couples Undergo Infertility Treatments Due to Male Infertility.

detailed_description.textblock:
Pomegranate contains a high concentration of vitamins ( C,   B1,   B2,   B3,   B5),
      potassium, Magnesium , Zinc and is a good source for polyphenols .Polyphenols molecules have
      been found to possess antioxidant properties and may effects the expression of different
      genes . Recent studies indicate that among foods that contain polyphenols, juice extracted
      from the pomegranate has the highest concentration of measurable polyphenols . Pomegranates
      have shown inhibitory effect on NF-κB and the MAP kinases JNK and ERK, which are critical
      steps in the cascade of events leading to inflammatory response. The NF- κB pathway is
      activated in response to bacterial infection and initiates the inflammatory cascade, which
      may explain the protective effect of Pomegranates on bacterial infections.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  TMC  of less than 5 million spermatogonia in native sperm and morphology less than 4%
             by Kruger criteria.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  sensitivity to Pomegranate

clinical_study.keyword: pomegranate pills, male infertility, pregnancy rate, semen analysis, ROS, oxidative stress
clinical_study.official_title: Anti-oxidative Influence From Pomegranate Tablets on Male Sperm Quality in Couples Undergo Infertility Treatments Due to Male Infertility.

overall_official.affiliation: Hillel Yaffe Medical center, IVF unit, Hadera, Israel

oversight_info.authority: Israel: The Israel National Institute for Health Policy Research and Health Services Research

secondary_outcome.description: The unit for measure the ROS are Micromolar epicatechin equivalent
secondary_outcome.measure: ROS (reactive oxidative stress )and Interleukins level in semen fluid

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Factorial Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Supportive Care
